title: Cream of wild mushroom soup
ingredients: ['25g dried porcini mushrooms (ceps)', '50g butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 garlic clove, sliced', '1 to 2 thyme sprigs', '400g mixed wild mushrooms', '850ml vegetable stock', '200ml tub crème fraîche', '4 slices white bread, about 100g, cubed', 'chives and truffle oil, to serve']
